title: Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     July 29, 2016  Mosquitoes Test Positive for West Nile Virus  Mosquitoes in the Kettle Falls Day Use and Group Campsites have tested positive for West Nile Virus.   July 12, 2016  Mosquitoes at Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area  Be prepared for mosquitoes when you visit Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area.   June 30, 2016  Fire Restrictions Established at Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area  2016 lakebed fire restrictions established for the season.   June 22, 2016  Complete Fireworks Ban at Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area and Colville Confederated Tribal Lands  Fireworks prohibited on Confederated Tribes of the Colville Reservation and Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area managed land and waters.   June 20, 2016  Centennial Quilt Show “Inspired by the National Parks”  Information about the upcoming 4th of July Quilt Show.   February 03, 2016  Black Locust Tree Removal Plan 2016  The action plan to remove the invasive Black Locust Trees.   December 20, 2015  2016 Annual Boat Launch Passes Now Available  The 2016 Annual Boat Launch Permits are now being sold.       .
